com.labyrinthconquest.game.levels

Class Level

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.labyrinthconquest.game.levels.Level

  • public class Level
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a level in the game, handles loading, creating and updating level instance

      • Level

        public Level(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.SpriteBatch batch,

             java.lang.String id,
             int desiredPlayersInGoal,
             MainGame game,
             Localisation loc)
        Create a new instance of a level
        Parameters:
        batch - Batch to be used for drawing
        camera - Camera used for rendering
        tileMapName - Name of the tilemap
        id - Level identification
        desiredPlayersInGoal - Players in this level
        game - MainGame instance
        loc - Localisation file

                                    java.lang.String userData,
                                    boolean isSensor,
                                    short category)
        Transform layer objects to Box2D bodies
        Parameters:
        layer - Layer to transform
        userData - User data to be included in the body
        isSensor - Is the body a sensor? (used only for contact events, not collisions)
        category - Collision category
